entry.title: Wooden Alphabet Flash Cards • Uppercase Letters on Sturdy Wood Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 80.00 - 90.00 (2 variants)

Learning at home should seamlessly blend form and function, beauty and practicality. Our handmade wooden alphabet cards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as tabletop references, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a phonics resource, or for tracing with little fingers! Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, these engraved cards allow children to trace their fingers over the engraved letterforms while absorbing their shape. All 26 letters of the alphabet, A-Z, are included and pictured in a large, modern, easy-to-read font.

Each wooden card measures 4" wide by 6" tall and 0.2" thick, and make for a lovely collection in the school room. Durable materials mean that these flash cards will last through many years of home education. Purchase 26 flash cards alone; or purchase the 26 cards & coordinating wooden stand together for an easy way to display and reference letters at various times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Wooden stand measures 5.75" wide by nearly 2" tall and approximately 1.5" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your cards. Purchase other flash card designs in our shop and seamlessly switch out your displays as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Large wooden alphabet board and lowercase flash cards are not included but are available for purchase separately!

Our handmade wooden continent cards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as tabletop references, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a resource for memorization, or for plotting their next adventure! Each wooden card measures 4" wide by 6" tall and 0.2" thick, and make for a lovely collection in the school room. Durable materials mean that these flash cards will last through many years of home education and geographical curiosity. Purchase the flash cards alone; or purchase the 7 cards & coordinating wooden stand together for an easy way to display and reference your continents at all times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. entry.title: Wooden Shapes Flash Cards • Set of 18 Geometric Wood Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 60.00 - 70.00 (2 variants)

Our handmade wooden shape cards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as tabletop references, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a math resource, or for tracing with little fingers!

Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, these engraved cards allow children to trace their fingers over the engraved shapes and forms while absorbing their angles, sides, and points. Features 18 different shapes and their names below in a large, modern, easy-to-read font.

SHAPES INCLUDED:

• Circle
• Triangle
• Square

• Diamond

Each wooden card measures 4" wide by 6" tall and 0.2" thick, and makes for a lovely collection in the school room. Durable materials mean that these flash cards will last through many years of home education. Purchase 18 shape flash cards alone; or purchase the 18 cards & coordinating wooden stand together for an easy way to display and reference different shapes at various times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Wooden stand measures 5.75" wide by nearly 2" tall and approximately 1.5" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your cards. Purchase other flash card designs (alphabet, continents) in our shop and seamlessly switch out your displays as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Full sized shapes board shown in some photos is not included but is available for purchase separately.

entry.title: Custom Name Wooden Interlocking Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Custom charge per letter
Price: 6.00 - 50.00 (30 variants)

Let children familiarize themselves with the letters and order of their name with our customizable wooden letter puzzle! Inspired by Montessori movable alphabets, we created this one-of-a-kind heirloom-quality personalized puzzle for children to use in a variety of open-ended ways and enjoy for years on end. Inspired by Montessori materials and sandpaper numbers, we created this tactile, durable game to make learning and literacy a little more fun and a whole lot more beautiful.

Made of solid maple wood, these lightweight wooden puzzle pieces are made of durable, natural materials and are easy for little ones to grasp, trace, feel, and explore as they learn and play. Intentionally designed in a modern, child-friendly font for easy legibility. This puzzle set comes with as many pieces as you need to spell whichever name, word, or phrase you wish!

We offer personalized orders featuring uppercase letters or digits 0-9. Please leave your personalization request at checkout EXACTLY as you'd like it to read, as we will design accordingly (if multiple words are needed, please indicate). Select your puzzle piece quantity through the dropdown menu at checkout! Your wooden letter set comes in a lovely cloth drawstring bag for safekeeping and sustainable, eco-friendly storage.

Use your custom wooden letters to:

• Identify individual letters and their sounds
• Practice assembling letters in the right order to form names and meaningful words or phrases

Each name puzzle is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. These modern letters are a lovely addition to a nursery, homeschool environment, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands for many years.

entry.title: Wooden Map of the United States of America
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 42.00 - 52.00 (2 variants)

Our handmade wooden map boards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as a tabletop reference board, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a resource for memorization, or for plotting their next road trip! Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, this engraved map allows children to trace their fingers in the grooves of state boundaries and feel each border while absorbing the beauty of our country's 50 states and names in a crisp, clear, easy-to-read sans serif font.

This wooden board measures 15" wide by 12" tall and 0.625" thick, large enough to be a lovely heirloom piece in the school room and last through many years of home education and geographical curiosity. Purchase the board alone and lean on a shelf or lay flat on a table or lap; purchase the board & stand together for an easy way to display your map at all times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Wooden stand measures 10" wide by 2" tall and 3" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your map. Purchase other board designs in our shop and seamlessly switch out your display as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and toddlers to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Wooden flashcards pictured in some of the images are not included but are available for purchase here!

entry.title: Custom Engraved Wooden Phone • Personalized Toy Smartphone
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 24.00

Our wooden toy phone serves two important purposes: open-ended play for imaginative little ones (who want their own phone!), as well as helping toddlers and older children memorize important phone numbers. In this age of digital contacts, safety information like phone numbers are perhaps discussed less than in past generations. To ensure your child knows a parent's phone number, allow us to engrave the 10-digit telephone number of your choice so little ones can absorb and recall important information while playing.

Our toy phone combines the design of 2020 smartphones with the timeless materials of Montessori toys - beautiful, sturdy maple wood. Features a smooth back side and engraved front design with raised numbers so that children can feel the characters as they "dial." As kids familiarize themselves with the layout of modern phones, they also practice safety skills and independence while playing with their very own phone.

We created this tactile, durable toy to make learning and play a little more fun and a whole lot more beautiful.

Each wooden toy from Gladfolk is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children of all ages to enjoy. This modern telephone toy is a lovely addition to a playroom, homeschool environment, or as a memorable heirloom-quality gift for kids.

Each phone measures approximately 3" wide x 6" tall and 0.625" thick.

entry.title: Wooden Number Set • Wood Numerals & Math Symbols in Maple
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 22.00 - 64.00 (4 variants)

Let children explore numerals and practice mathematics through play with our wooden number set in beautiful maple wood! Inspired by Montessori movable alphabets and number sets, we created a one-of-a-kind heirloom-quality numeral set for families to use in a variety of open-ended ways and enjoy for years on end.

Made of solid maple wood, these lightweight wooden numbers are made of durable, natural materials and are easy for little ones to grasp, trace, feel, and explore as they learn and play. Intentionally designed in a modern, child-friendly font with slightly rounded edges at the corners, prioritizing safety and legibility.

We offer our wood number sets in a few options:

• Simple Set: Digits 0-9 (10 pieces)
• Full Math Set: Digits 0-9 (10 pieces) AND 9 math symbols: plus sign, minus sign, division sign, multiplication sign, equals sign, greater than/less than sign, comma, decimal point, and dollars sign
• Double Set includes Double Digits 0-9 (2 of each single digit, 20 numbers in total) AND 9 math symbols: plus sign, minus sign, division sign, multiplication sign, equals sign, comma, decimal point, and dollars sign
• Triple Set includes Triple Digits 0-9 (3 of each single digit, 30 numbers in total) AND 9 math symbols: plus sign, minus sign, division sign, multiplication sign, equals sign, comma, decimal point, and dollars sign

Your wooden numbers comes in a lovely cloth drawstring bag for safekeeping and sustainable, eco-friendly storage.

Use our wooden numbers to:

• Identify individual numerals
• Practice assembling pieces in numeric order
• Create meaningful numbers - ages, addresses, and more
• Practice math problems, monetary amounts, and place value
• Tracing, stamping in dough, and referencing while writing

Each set of numbers is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. These modern math sets are a lovely addition to a playroom, homeschool environment, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands and eager minds for many years.

Digits measure approximately 2.25" tall, 0.2" thick, and width varies by number.

Let children explore letterforms and practice their alphabet through play with our full wooden alphabet set in beautiful maple wood! entry.title: Wooden Number Puzzle • Children's Counting Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 26.00

Explore numbers and digits with this innovative matching game for little hands!

Features 10 wooden blocks consisting of digits 0-9 in a modern sans serif font. Children are challenged to sort through and correctly order the interlocking wooden puzzle pieces and form an accurate number line. Fun for all ages, whether introducing just a few digits at a time for toddlers, or allowing older children to try and complete it in record time! Perfectly interlocking shapes makes a satisfying number line for kids as they observe and interact with numbers from an early age.

Inspired by Montessori materials and sandpaper numbers, we created this tactile, durable game to make learning and numeracy a little more fun and a whole lot more beautiful.

Made of solid maple wood, these lightweight wooden puzzle pieces are made of durable, natural materials and are easy for little ones to grasp, trace, feel, and explore as they learn and play. Intentionally designed in a modern, child-friendly font for easy legibility. This puzzle set contains 10 pieces, with digits 0-9, and comes in a lovely cloth drawstring bag for safekeeping and sustainable, eco-friendly storage.

Each alphabet puzzle is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. This modern puzzle is a lovely addition to a playroom, homeschool environment, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands for many years.

Each puzzle piece measure approximately 2" tall x 2" wide and 0.2" thick, forming a 20" wide number line when completed.

entry.title: Wooden Number Match Puzzle • Handmade Wood Domino Style Matching Game
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 46.00

Explore numbers and digits with this innovative matching game for little hands!

Features 24 wooden blocks consisting of numbers 1-12 and their coordinating quantity shown in domino-style dots. Children are challenged to sort through and correctly match numerals with their quantities. Fun for all ages, whether introducing just a few digits at a time for toddlers, or allowing older children to try and complete it in record time! Perfectly interlocking shapes make 12 satisfying number pairs for kids as they practice counting, number recognition, and subitizing.

Inspired by Montessori materials and sandpaper numbers, we created this tactile, durable game to make learning and numeracy a little more fun and a whole lot more beautiful.

Made of solid maple wood, these lightweight wooden puzzle pieces are made of durable, natural materials and are easy for little ones to grasp, trace, feel, and explore as they learn and play. Intentionally designed in a modern, child-friendly font for easy legibility. This puzzle set contains 24 pieces, with 12 numeral pieces and 12 dot pieces. Comes in a lovely cloth drawstring bag for safekeeping and sustainable, eco-friendly storage.

Each domino number puzzle is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. This modern puzzle is a lovely addition to a playroom, homeschool environment, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands for many years.

Each puzzle piece measure approximately 2" tall x 2" wide and 0.2" thick, forming 4" wide number pairs when matched.

entry.title: Wooden Moon Phase Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 48.00

Study and delight in all 8 of the moon's lunar phases as seen from Earth with our wooden Moon Phase puzzle! Fun for children and adults alike, this tactile toy is educational in a variety of ways. Little ones can experiment with puzzle pieces and shapes, while older children and adults can study the rotation of the moon in orbit and discuss the various shadows and fractions of the moon that appear in the night sky with this modern board as an excellent reference.

Engraved and cut from a beautiful smooth maple plywood, our moon puzzle features modern typography and all eight phases of the moon cycle:

• New Moon (engraved shadow only; no cutout piece)
• Waxing Crescent
• First Quarter
• Waxing Gibbous
• Full Moon
• Waning Gibbous
• Last Quarter
• Waning Crescent

Puzzle board measures 16" x 10" and pieces vary in width (full moon puzzle piece measures 3.2" across).

As an added challenge, children can line up and name the moon phases using just the cutout pieces alone, without the labels of the puzzle board. Endless options await to study space, lunar phases, orbits, the shadows seen on the moon, and more!

Each puzzle is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured by little hands and eager minds for years to come.

Our handmade wooden number boards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as a tabletop reference board, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a tracing tool, and a large, sturdy surface for counting and number games or math practice. Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, this engraved alphabet allows children to trace their fingers in the grooves of the wood and feel each letterform while absorbing the beauty of numbers 1-100 in a crisp, clear, easy-to-read sans serif font.

This wooden number board measures 12" x 12" and approximately 0.625" thick, large enough to be a lovely heirloom piece in the school room and last through many years of home education and number practice. Lean on a shelf or lay flat on a table, lap, or floor while learning, and easily move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference while learning, counting, and practicing arithmetic.

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources make a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Please note that each board & stand is unique and made-to-order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece.

entry.title: Wooden Ten Frame Board with Counting Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Wooden Learning Boards
Price: 28.00

For developing a strong number sense, practicing addition, subtraction, and familiarizing little ones with the base 10 system - look no further than our strong and sturdy wooden ten frame! Featuring a beautiful, thick, rectangular board with squares in a 5x2 pattern and a set of 10 small wooden counting pieces for endless hands-on mathematics practice.

Inspired by Montessori materials and modern mathematic curriculum, we created this tactile, durable activity to make learning and numeracy a little more fun and a whole lot more beautiful.

The ten frame board is made of solid maple wood, and the coordinating counting pieces are lightweight circles in a lovely contrasting walnut wood type. Made of durable, natural materials and easy for little ones to maneuver, grasp, count, and explore as they learn and play. The 10 counting pieces come in a lovely little cloth drawstring bag for safekeeping and sustainable, eco-friendly storage.

Each ten frame set is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. This modern math board is a lovely addition to a playroom, classroom, or homeschool environment - sure to be enjoyed by little hands and eager minds for many years.

Each board measures approximately 10" wide x 4" tall and 0.625" thick. Round counting pieces are approximately 1.25" in diameter.

Please note that each set is unique and made-to-order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece.

entry.title: Wooden Place Value Board from Ones to Thousands
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Wooden Learning Boards
Price: 26.00

Learning at home should seamlessly blend form and function, beauty and practicality. Our handmade wooden place value board is designed to help children understand numerals, quantities, and learn their ones, tens, hundreds, and thousands!

Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and hands-on learning concepts, this sturdy engraved board allows children to practice creating numbers themselves all the way through the thousands. Place value names are engraved at the bottom in a large, modern, easy-to-read font.

Our board measures 12" wide by 4" tall and 0.625" thick, and makes for a lovely learning tool in the school room. Durable materials mean that, unlike paper, this mathematics board will last through many years of home education.

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Please note that each place value board is unique and made-to-order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece.

* Wooden numerals pictured in some of the images are not included but can be purchased separately here!

entry.title: Wooden Shapes Montessori Board and Tabletop Geometry Reference Chart
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Wooden Learning Boards, Stands
Price: 42.00 - 52.00 (2 variants)

Learning at home should seamlessly blend form and function, beauty and practicality. Our handmade wooden shapes board with coordinating wood shape pieces is designed with multiple uses in mind - as a matching activity and puzzle for little hands, shape pieces for geometry practice, tracing, and exploration, and as a beautiful piece of art to be displayed when not in use. Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, this engraved board allows children to trace their fingers in the grooves of the wood and feel each shape while absorbing the beauty of each form in this crisp, clear, easy-to-read chart. Our design features 18 basic shapes and their corresponding names, and all 18 shapes cut out in contrasting walnut wood pieces, plus an optional add-on stand for display.


INCLUDES:
• Shapes Board
• 18 Shape Pieces in a Cotton Bag

OPTIONAL ADD-ON:
• Wooden Display Stand

Board measures 13" wide by 10" tall and over 0.5" thick, large enough to be a lovely heirloom piece in the school room and last through many years of home education and puzzle practice. Maple plywood board contrasts beautifully with the matching walnut shape pieces. Small shape pieces come in a cotton drawstring bag for easy storage. Purchase the board & shapes alone and lean on a shelf or lay flat on a table or lap; purchase the board, shapes, and stand together for an easy way to display at all times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference while studying or drawing.

Please note this is not a traditional puzzle where pieces fit down in a deep groove; it is a matching activity where kids can line up the walnut shapes on the board in the correct spots. The board is then fully functional as an art piece when not "in use" with the shape pieces. Shape pieces are also useful independently for games, tracing, or stamping in dough.

Wooden stand measures 10" wide by 2" tall and 3" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your board. Purchase other reference board designs in our shop and seamlessly switch out your display as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and toddlers to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Please note that each board & stand is unique and made-to-order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece.

entry.title: Wooden Alphabet Montessori Board and Tabletop Reference Chart • Classic Script Cursive
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Wooden Learning Boards, Stands
Price: 38.00 - 48.00 (2 variants)

Learning at home should seamlessly blend form and function, beauty and practicality. For children of all ages, having a literacy-rich environment with easily accessible letters is paramount to solid foundations in reading and writing. Our handmade wooden alphabet boards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as a tabletop reference board, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a tracing tool, and a large, sturdy surface for alphabet and spelling games or letter practice. Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, this engraved alphabet allows children to trace their fingers in the grooves of the wood and feel each letterform while absorbing the beauty of the full alphabet. For children working on cursive and traditional script, this reference board displays the classic letterforms in a crisp, clear, easy-to-read cursive font.

This wooden board is large enough to be a lovely heirloom piece in the school room and last through many years of home education and letter practice. Purchase the board alone and lean on a shelf or lay flat on a table or lap; purchase the board & stand together for an easy way to display your alphabet at all times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference while reading and writing.

Available with or without our wooden stand with a perfectly angled groove for holding your alphabet board. Purchase other board designs in our shop and seamlessly switch out your display as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and toddlers to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Please note that each board & stand is unique and made-to-order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece.

entry.title: Custom Modern Wooden Name Blocks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Custom charge per letter
Price: 8.00 - 120.00 (90 variants)

Our Custom Name Block Set features personalized solid wood blocks - engraved on one side with each letter of your little one's name. Remaining sides are blank. Order as many blocks as you need to spell out the words you want - first name, middle, and last, if you desire! Have fun playing practicing letter recognition and early spelling skills, as well as decorate with modern neutrals that add texture and character to a nursery or play room.

Each set of blocks is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and toddlers to enjoy. These modern blocks are a lovely addition to a nursery, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands for many years.

Please note that each set of blocks is unique and made to order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece.

entry.title: Modern Wooden Alphabet Blocks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Wooden blocks
Price: 48.00

Our modern Alphabet & Numeral Block Set features 6 solid wood blocks - each side engraved with a letter of the alphabet or single digit number. Features 1 each of letters A-Z and digits 0-9 so your little one can quickly learn their letters and numbers! Have fun playing "find the letter", "find the number", or make up simple first spelling words with this versatile set!

Each set of blocks is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and toddlers to enjoy. These modern blocks are a lovely addition to a nursery, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands for many years.

Please note that each set of blocks is unique and made-to-order; wood tone and grain will vary from piece to piece. Choose from maple, cherry or walnut wood.
